8955b3d0-2321-4c32-aa17-582382da2a09.description:
Key Features & Capabilities
🚀 High-Speed Batch Processing
Utilizes a multi-threaded engine with selectable speed profiles (Slow, Medium, Fast, Ultra) to check accounts concurrently and maximize speed.
🧠 Deep Account Intelligence
Extracts full Garena security details: Email/Phone binding, 2FA status, and Shell balance.
Pulls complete Call of Duty: Mobile stats: Nickname, Level, UID, and Region.
🗂️ Intelligent File Sorting
Automatically saves valid accounts into a structured folder system sorted by Country, security status (clean/not_clean), and CODM Level Range.
🛡️ Smart CAPTCHA Shield
Detects Garena's CAPTCHA blocks, pauses the scan, and allows you to resume after an IP change, making large-scale checking possible.
✨ Elite Report Generation
For every valid account, it displays a detailed, color-coded "Elite Report" in the console for immediate analysis.
🔔 Optional Telegram Alerts
Can be configured to instantly send the Elite Report to your Telegram for high-value accounts (Level 150+).
💾 Scan Resumption & Progress Saving
Automatically saves your progress, allowing you to safely stop and resume long scans without starting over from the beginning.

Can check 1k lines

6643e8f0-5b17-48f3-afc1-1dbe67b39dab.description:
Key Features:


🚀 High-Speed Bulk Checker
Processes large user:pass lists with an automatic duplicate remover to ensure maximum efficiency.
🎮 Detailed CODM Profiler
Retrieves player Nickname, Level, Region, and UID for all linked Garena accounts.
📂 Smart Result Organization
Automatically sorts successful hits into folders by Country and CODM Level Range (e.g., results/PH/101-200_clean.txt).
🤖 Intelligent CAPTCHA Recovery
When blocked, the script pauses and offers recovery options like fetching new cookies or retrying after an IP change.
🔄 Session & Progress Resume
Never lose your work. The script saves its progress, allowing you to resume an interrupted session from exactly where you left off.
📊 In-Depth Analytics
At the end of each session, receive a full report detailing hit rates, country distribution, and highlights for top-tier accounts.
📲 Instant Telegram Alerts
Get real-time notifications sent directly to your Telegram for every successful account hit with CODM data.
